project_plan.name: Python-Based Quiz Game
project_plan.description: Design a Python quiz game that features multiple-choice questions, tracks user scores, and displays results at the end of the game. The questions and answers will be stored in a variable.

task.name: Define the questions and answers variable
Implement function to display questions and get user input
Implement scoring logic to track correct answers
Implement a function to display the final score
Write tests for each of the implemented features (questions, scoring, and score display)
Execute tests on the quiz game to ensure all features work correctly
